create.title: Generate Secret Phrase
print: DO NOT FORGET to save your mnemonic Secret Phrase. You will need your
Mnemonic Secret Phrase to restore your wallet.
Do not lose it! It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
Do not share it! Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a phishing site.
Make a backup! Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

verify.title: Verify Mnemonic Words
verify.placeholder: Pick words in the correct order to recreate your secret phrase.

setup_acc.title: Account setup
setup_acc.name: An account name.
setup_acc.pass_description: A password is required to encrypt your wallet.

restore.title: Restore.
restore.placeholder: Input secret words, with a space between words.

wallet_created.title: Wallet is generated!
wallet_created.subt_title: Your account has been created - Keep your secret phrase safe. Itâ€™s your responsibility!

tips.title: Tips on storing it safely

list.0: Save a backup in multiple places
list.1: Never share the words with anyone
list.2: Be careful of phishing! Bearby will never spontaneously ask for your secret phrase
list.3: If you need to back up your secret phrase again, you can find it in Security
list.4: If you ever have a question or see something fishy, contact us.

tips.warn: Bearby team cannot recover your secret words!

add.title: Add Account
add.description: Generate the next account from the secret phrase.

config.title: Node settings
config.description: All nodes are automatically updated and a few of the fastest ones are selected

downgrade.title: Smart Request
downgrade.description: The wallet automatically collects nodes in the network and chooses the faster option.

timeout.title: Abort Timeout
timeout.description: The time in seconds for the request to be executed.

nodes.title: Number of nodes
nodes.description: Maximum number of nodes to use.

https.title: Https only
https.description: Protects your requests with the Https/TLS protocol (not all nodes support)

period.title: Period offset
period.description: The number of blocks for which a transaction should confirm.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Add, edit, remove, and manage your contacts.

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: Add and edit custom node API networks.

connections.title: Connections
connections.description: DApps list, manage your connections, add, remove.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Privacy settings and wallet Secret Recovery Phrase.

about.title: About
about.description: Version, support center, and contact info.

currency.title: Currency Conversion
currency.description: You can switch to another currency to track your balance.

theme.title: Interface theme.
theme.description: You can change the color theme; by default, it detects the system theme automatically.

p_modal.title: Secret Recovery Phrase
p_modal.warn: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! These words can be used to steal all of your accounts.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Change your password and algorithms for encryption!

phrase.title: Reveal Secret Recovery Phrase
phrase.description: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this Secret Recovery Phrase to access your accounts. Save it somewhere safe and secret.
phrase.label: Enter password to continue

key.title: Show Private Keys
key.warn: Warning: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can steal any assets held in your account.

phishing.title: Use Phishing Detection
phishing.warn: Display a warning for phishing domains targeting Massa users.

gas.title: Gas Price
gas.description: Choose your default gas price. All of your transactions will use these gas parameters.

popup.title: Popup
popup.description: You can disable the appearance of the transaction confirmation window.

format.title: Number Formatting
format.description: Shorten the token amount with units (K, M, B)

connections.title: Connections
connections.no_apps: You don't have any connections yet!

connect.warn: After confirmation, this application will be able to request data from the blockchain and see your accounts.

pub_key_req.title: Request encryption public key
pub_key_req.description: Would you like to provide your public encryption key? By consenting, this site will be able to compose encrypted messages to you.
